job.title: Software Engineer-React Native-APJS
job.description: Our Vision is to change the way the world communicates Our Mission is to connect people and thingsbrbrWe are reimagining the way people watch TV with services like Sling and AirTV We are redefining the boundaries of communication and connectivity too with our planned green field 5G cloud native network build out and the Internet of Things Nothing is out of our reach and the opportunity to shape the future of entertainment and technology has never been more tangiblebrbrstronguAbout The PositionbrbrustrongOur mission is to build a modern hybrid cloud enterprise platform for all DISH to consume Our environment isbrulli Complex lili Highly elastic lili Based on some of the latest and greatest cloud native technologies lili Very fast paced brbrliulstrong Basic Requirements brbrstrongA successful React Native Mobile developer willbrulli Be available to work onsite out of our American Fork UT or Englewood CO offices lili Have a 4year college degree in Computer Science  Information Technology Masters degree is preferred or equivalent professional experience lili Have 3 years of relevant experience lili Software development experience and minimum mobile apps development experience brbrliulstrong Technologies in our environment brbrstrongHere are some of the key technologies that make up our environment While we do not expect you to have a detailed understanding of ueachu the more of these you are familiar with the betterbrulli Handson experience working on React Native on the front end to create AndroidiOS Apps lili Thorough understanding of React Native and its core principles lili Strong proficiency in JavaScript including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model lili Firm grasp of the JavaScript and TypeScript or ClojureScript language and its nuances including ES6 syntax lili Rock solid at working with thirdparty dependencies and debugging dependency conflicts lili Familiarity with native build tools like XCode Gradle Android Studio IntelliJ lili Understanding of REST APIs the document request model and offline storage lili Experience with popular React workflows such as Flux or Redux lili Experience creating optimizing and integrating Application Programming Interface API calls background in API development preferred lili Create Technical Requirements Documentation based on Product Requirement Documents lili Build highlevel user interfaces using rapid prototyping methodologies lili Design application frameworks for use across multiple products lili Work with internal technical teams to identify and build platform elements required to support key mobile product features brbrliulDICECAbrbrCompensation 9936000Yr  15766500YrbrbrFrom versatile health perks to new career opportunities check out our benefits on our careers website brbrEmployment is contingent on Successful completion of a preemployment screen which may include a drug testbrbr
